function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited deployment of 5G networks and limited availability of 5G devices","Impact":"Delayed advancement of 5G technology, hindering connectivity and capacity for many countries","Mitigation":"Governments and network operators should push forward their deployment plans, encourage small-scale 5G deployments, and incentivize spectrum auction commitments","Technologies":"5G deployment and spectrum sharing technologies","People":"Countries with limited 5G connectivity and network operators","Owner":"Governments, network operators, and spectrum auction regulators"},{"Description":"Complexity and implementation issues of 5G devices, including power consumption and multi-band support","Impact":"Increased cost, production challenges, and slower adoption of 5G technology","Mitigation":"Encourage purpose-built IoT devices for e-health use-cases, offer discounts to mobile operators in spectrum auctions, and enable RAN sharing for cost minimization","Technologies":"Purpose-built IoT devices, spectrum auction incentives, and RAN sharing technology","People":"Manufacturers, mobile operators, and network providers","Owner":"Governments and industry regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5G networks and the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Disrupted network connectivity, infrastructure damage, and public safety concerns","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns to address misinformation, security measures for base stations, and collaboration with local authorities for protection","Technologies":"Public awareness campaigns and security measures for base stations","People":"Network operators, local communities, and relevant authorities","Owner":"Network operators, local authorities, and public health organizations"}]}
